===Alternative forms===
* {{zh-l|八個雅鹿}}, {{zh-l|八格牙魯}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ja|zh}} {{m|ja|馬鹿野郎|tr=baka yarō||[[idiot]]}}. Popularised by TV series on the [[w:Second Sino-Japanese War|Second Sino-Japanese War]] in Mainland China, where the use of this interjection by Japanese officers usually symbolises the brutality of the Japanese army. Often pronounced /ˈbagəjalu/. See also [[w:zh:日本軍隊中國語|日本軍隊中國語]] ("Chinese language spoken by the Japanese army") on Wikipedia.
